website_summaries.verdict: While more expensive than similar consoles, the feature set alone puts this one way ahead of the competition.
pros: Available in espresso or glazed pine finish
The heater has a number of features not found in other models, including an adjustable thermostat, timer, and adjustable flame-log brightness
Has a remote with a child-safety lock
cons: Directions could be a little easier to follow, particularly the illustrations that are used
Given the sheer number of screws involved in its assembly, some form of electric screwdriver is advised

customer_reviews.title: Great instructions, all parts were there
customer_reviews.text: Just received the Narita Media Electric Fireplace - Espresso, my son put it together for me in 2 hours without any problems. Great instructions, all parts were there. Two boxes came, no damage to either. We have a 65 inch 4K TV on top and it holds and fits nicely. Not to heavy at all. It looks sturdy and makes our living room very attractive. Can't wait to put the Christmas tree up next to the fireplace.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila King-Smith

customer_reviews.title: Thankfully all the parts arrived in good condition and the instructions were not hard to follow
customer_reviews.text: Our unit arrived yesterday in two boxes. My husband and I assembled the console in about two hours with minimal difficulty and frustration. Thankfully all the parts arrived in good condition and the instructions were not hard to follow. The unit is nice and solid and fits in well with other quality furniture. I was afraid it would look cheap but it is very handsome and sturdy. I'm glad I didn't give too much weight to the negative reviews and am very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: RichMitch

customer_reviews.title: Yes, go for this one!  I recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It was one of the best investments I have made this year! We have used this about every evening this winter. It takes the chill off in our bedroom after showers and while getting ready for bed. We turn on the TV and the electric fireplace and it is nice and cozy before falling asleep. The unit was not difficult to put together, but get someone to help out. Two is better than one, and that is Biblical!
customer_reviews.author: Linda S. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE HAD THIS FOR ALMOST A YEAR AND IT STILL LOOKS AND WORKS GREAT. THE FIRE PLACE LOOKS REALISTIC AND YOU CAN ADJUST THE FLAMES HIEGHT AND THE BRIGHTNESS OF THE LOG AND THE HEATING OUTPUT. MY BOYFRIEND PUT IT TOGETHER FOR ME IN ABOUT AN HOUR AND W/O READING THE DIRECTIONS. THE VERY SLIGHT HUMMING SOUND IS NOT NOTICEABLE UNLESS THE ROOM IS QUIET AND YOU PUT YOUR FACE UP ON IT. MY FURNACE HAD WENT OUT FOR 2DAYS AND THIS THING KEPT MY LIVING ROOM NICE & DINING ROOM NICE AND TOASTY.
customer_reviews.author: loves it!

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: My wife an I love this thing. It is for the most part real wood and weighs quite a lot. The fireplace looks as close to real as you can get and has 6 settings for fire and 6 for wood as well as a digital thermostat.It loses a star for the instructions. Helpful but not detailed. It took us about 3 hours all together to put it together using only a #2 phillips screwdriver. Very sturdy and a nice finish.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Who's laughing now?!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this much to the irritation of my husband. He said it would look ridiculous. It is a very nice piece of furniture. Assembly takes time and the directions (mostly the illustrations) are a little hard to follow. However, the quality is great. All the holes were drilled in the right places, etc. The fireplace looks really nice in our family room. Puts out a good amount of heat. Even the husband likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle B

customer_reviews.title: really good deal
customer_reviews.text: pros: ok so first off its real wood not that crap press board. i open the box and the smell of stained wood greets me! amazing. the fire place works great easy to use and adjustable. it fits my 50" tv perfectly. cons: the only problem i have with this uinit is. it still uses the crazy lock nuts that come in the press board desks and stuff. they are way to brittle i broke 6 trying to built this thing. fortunately i was able to remove some from my old entertainment center and use those. other then that it was an easy build.
customer_reviews.author: anthony davis

customer_reviews.title: It looks every bit as nice as it does in the picture
customer_reviews.text: It only took three days for delivery. Since I'm not particularly handy and neither is my husband, we hired a guy to put it together. It only took him an hour and a half. It looks every bit as nice as it does in the picture. The color is accurate and is well constructed and solid. The fireplace unit works great-all the benefits of a fireplace without the hassle (It looks real enough to suit me.). I would recommend this media fireplace console to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen Albert

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Came on time ,all there nothing missing or broken took me 1hour and 30 minutes to assemble not that easy but just concentrate and don't get distracted ,is real wood nice color ,yes the flames are only in yellow but it heats the living room easy and quickly ,let me tell you for this price this is one of my best decisions buying furniture highly recommend this furniture is and please read this for us my wife and I we love it and we think you will too.
customer_reviews.author: Av

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our newly finished basement, both for the heat aspect and the good looks. I cannot tell you how many compliments we have gotten! It looks fantastic and works great. My husband put it together quickly and it holds our multiple boxes (XBox, cable box, sound bar). Our tv is wall mounted above it, so I'm not sure how that would have worked. The heat works great and the fireplace is a nice touch. Great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking.
customer_reviews.text: Love it, however, it took me 4 hours to put together and they sent two left pieces and not a right piece so one piece above the fireplace keeps falling down because it isn't locked in so I have to glue it in or drill a whole to where the wood peg is suppose to go. Other than that love it, looks great, and the heat is quiet!.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: It looks good, but only because I had an additional 6" ...
customer_reviews.text: Not high enough. It looks good, but only because I had an additional 6" box built, stained to match and added to the bottom
customer_reviews.author: Leah Curtin

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, fun piece
customer_reviews.text: Just put it together. It is particle board (except for top piece) rather than solid wood, but the veneer looks very tough...almost like a laminate floor. Very good quality for the "put it together yourself" type of furniture. Does it looks like a real fire..no, of course not. But it is a fun addition to the study!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: GREAT..for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased...easy to operate...no grumbling from husband putting it together. Easy controls...nice options...the ONLY reason I didn't give it 5 stars is that it isn't high quality furniture...but we love it....especially the options of heat on or off...and being able to set brightness of logs and flame.
customer_reviews.author: Frances E. Hewes

customer_reviews.title: Went and purchased a much better way nicer made one
customer_reviews.text: 2nd one we tried. First was broken. 2nd was broken. We set it up which took a few hours and it is junk. Sent it back. Waiting on refund. Went and purchased a much better way nicer made one. I think amazon should refund me asap. Have to wait forever and be out another several hundred til they get around to it. Trust me..di not buy this.
customer_reviews.author: C. Vinnacombe

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but a pain putting together...
customer_reviews.text: We had this item shipped all the way to Kodiak, AK! It arrive in great condition. My only complaint is that we seem to have gotten a messed up one because one of the boards did not line up. My husband ended up having to get a saw out to even it up to where the pieces would fit together. Other than that we are enjoying it. If I hadn't have ordered it from here I would have returned for a new one, but the hassle of shipping it back would have been too much... so breaking out the saw is what we did...
customer_reviews.author: jferg

customer_reviews.title: The cabinet is great! The heater is cheep!
customer_reviews.text: The cabinet is great! Solid and beautifully finished, but the fire box is cheep! I bought this to heat my basement. It is difficult to hear TV while the heater is going. Even the flames crackle loudly. I would love to return this item, but I got rid of the boxes, so I am stuck with it ;( Would not buy it again, and definitely would not recommend to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Monika

customer_reviews.title: Good additional heat source
customer_reviews.text: Requires at least a couple of hours to assemble but all parts are marked and the instructions are clear. A brace on the top was not in the right place and a piece had to be sawed off for the the top to fit. We turn the house thermostat down in the evening and turn on the fireplace in the living room to watch TV. It works fine and would recommend it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Dixiefride

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece of furniture. Not quite deep enough to hold our DVD player so we had to leave the top back piece off, but otherwise I am very satisfied with it. The firebox is amazing and we have enjoyed using it in the evenings as we watch TV or just sit reading.
customer_reviews.author: Renee A. Waring

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this piece, especially the doors Easy to assemble, nice color
customer_reviews.author: Grammie

customer_reviews.title: Some assembly. Simple tools. Good instructions.
customer_reviews.text: We have a combination kitchen, island, living room and this fireplace keeps the whole area comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful buy, that will enjoy many hours of use ...
customer_reviews.text: Though it was very time consuming, it was well worth the effort to assemble. It came in two separate shipping boxes, within a day of one another. A wonderful buy, that will enjoy many hours of use monthly!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Strobeck

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and focus of conversation
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. I've had many compliments on how beautiful it is. It works to get the chill off and if it's not too cold it can keep it warm as well. Not made of that cheap particle board that most products are these days, it's very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Fireplace
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It's a beautiful addition to our living room. Took a little bit to put together but well worth it. Had to exchange it once bc we received it damaged but amazon was great about sending a new one and having the damaged one picked up. Would def recommend this product to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Toasty warm up in our loft!
customer_reviews.text: We were excited when we received the shipment, unassembled and hauled it up to the loft piece by piece. Took some time to assemble but it is a beautiful unit. The fireplace is the most realistic we have seen and the temperature adjustments are easy to make on the remote or you can have the flames without heat during the Phoenix summer. We don't have to worry about those no burn days in the valley!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Fish

customer_reviews.title: Met My Expectations
customer_reviews.text: I'd shopped for several months for an electric fireplace before deciding to buy this unit. It took several hours to assemble but with one person reading the directions and another assembling, the steps were easy. Some of the reviews advised that the color of the flames were not vibrant or realistic. I disagree. The flames are realistic and comforting and the unit is classy looking. I think this was a great investment for the price.
customer_reviews.author: dthom

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is so well made. Very heavy, good quality wood. The fireplace looks and works great! It keeps the TV area in our basement warm and toasty! Looks beautiful and our 50" television fits perfectly! Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: LaffDeb

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Love love love. Took about 3 hours and I did it alone. Read directions first! Flames are as real as an electric fireplace is going to get they do look good though. Love that I can have flames without heat.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent entertainment center. Heater is great, but a bit less powerful than communicated. Ceiling fan does the trick in spreading the heat evenly in the room.
customer_reviews.author: James Towle

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: A Task to put together save a whole day!!! Looks Great Heater is SO SO!! I thought it would kick a bit more heat but it alright. I would recommend with the disclaimer that the heater my disapoint a pinch.
customer_reviews.author: Big C

customer_reviews.title: Warm and cozy
customer_reviews.text: We love our new electric fireplace. The wood is a little "grainier" than expected, but we still like it. Heat's our living room nicely
customer_reviews.author: Curt Y.

customer_reviews.title: ... living room an the fake fire place looks so nice and the heater works great itakes our living room ...
customer_reviews.text: Lobe the way it looks in our living room an the fake fire place looks so nice and the heater works great itakes our living room warm in mear minutes
customer_reviews.author: Falisaty

customer_reviews.title: Even a Senior can assemble.
customer_reviews.text: We love it. It is so pretty. Living in a condo. it really makes the room feel comfortable. I had no problems assembling it, and I am a Senior.
customer_reviews.author: David B. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Media center with fireplac
customer_reviews.text: The item was all that could have been expected. It was reasonably easy to put together once I realized I shouldn't overtighten the bolts which have the clips. The fireplace came all in one piece which was great you just had to slide it into place and fasten it down, It works great and we love the remote for the fireplace.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Reisinger

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, but....
customer_reviews.text: The console was not difficult to assemble, and it looks great. The heat and visual from the fireplace makes the room very cozy. The downside is that the fireplace motor makes a humming sound that can be heard over a TV placed on the console. After a while you get used to it, but it was annoying at first.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Parker

customer_reviews.title: It is more beautiful in person and I was able to put it ...
customer_reviews.text: It is more beautiful in person and I was able to put it together myself it took about 3 hours but it was worth it
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Quality furniture at a nice price.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful cabinet. Warms a room quickly. Sturdily built. Quality furniture at a nice price.
customer_reviews.author: Angie K

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for the price. I have seen some complaints that it is hard to put together but I didn't have any problems with the assembly. Looks great in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: T. Mac

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase!! Had shopped for awhile and after reading reviews - decided on this unit!! Wanted it mainly for ambiance since we live in Florida. It's very nice pice of furniture!! Would certainly recommend this unit!!
customer_reviews.author: William Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but fire unrealistic
customer_reviews.text: The furniture itself is beautiful and very functional. It was easy to assemble. Only problem is the fire is not that pretty. It is only amber colored. Hard to tell in the picture. Haven't used the heat function yet. I would recommend it. Good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Athena Fike

customer_reviews.title: Loving this item....
customer_reviews.text: I so love this item... It took me about 5 hours to put it together by myself... it's prefect,beautiful.im Loving it
customer_reviews.author: MeMaw Beaudoin

customer_reviews.title: Media Console
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and a very lovely piece of furniture that looks awesome with our 55 inch Tv.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Riddle

customer_reviews.title: ... electric fireplace about a year ago and are very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: We bought this electric fireplace about a year ago and are very happy with it. It is sturdy and puts out plenty of heat.
customer_reviews.author: AmyTBarry

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it. It is beautiful and tops off a ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. It is beautiful and tops off a recently redone livingroom.
customer_reviews.author: TerriF

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: very nice. Works great. Took about an hour and a half to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D Winebrenner

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit - Fairly easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Nice unit - Fairly easy to assemble. Better have 2 people to handle the heavy delivery packages though. My wife loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Sharman

customer_reviews.title: SEI Narrita Espresso Media Console Electric Fireplace..
customer_reviews.text: It is cheap pressed wood. My Son lifted up on the top to move it back and it pulled apart. I am disappointed in the surround, it doesn't look like good to me. but the fireplace does give off heat.
customer_reviews.author: acrilic

customer_reviews.title: Nice TV Stand and Fireplace
customer_reviews.text: This was a bit time consuming to assemble, but is a nice piece of furniture. It is fairly sturdy and I am using it for a 60" Flat screen.
customer_reviews.author: John P. Burke

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Fireplace
customer_reviews.text: I love this product because it has so many features. I can change the settings for the flame and log to be brighter or dimmer. I can change the heat settings or turn it off completely. There is also a timer. It comes all in pieces but has excellent directions that are super easy to follow. This thing is sturdy. It is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Its well built and a beautiful addition to our living space
customer_reviews.text: Im impressed. I ordered monday the 2nd and it was on my doorstep tuesday 3rd. Its well built and a beautiful addition to our living space. Only one tiny hiccup..one of the backslats was ever so slightly longer and it was difficult to hit the pre drilled holes...
customer_reviews.author: Candy Rockwell

customer_reviews.title: Overall happy with the look
customer_reviews.text: Luv the fire place, looks beautiful and not bulky, however should have had more support to when connecting the top with the bottom, overall happy with the look.
customer_reviews.author: Irene Sakalis

customer_reviews.title: unassembled
customer_reviews.text: When ordering I did not know it wasn't all together. That would have made a difference in my buying item. I do love it though.
customer_reviews.author: Maxine Kirk

customer_reviews.title: A Cozy Addition
customer_reviews.text: The media console was quite time-consuming to put together. Assembly took about 3 hours. The final product is lovely, however. It's sturdy, attractive, and doesn't take up too much space in a small to medium size room. We made the mistake of not putting in the piece that you see right above the fireplace and had to disassemble much of what we had already put together to fit it in. We didn't think it was clear in the directions. So, don't forget it! The fireplace flame is completely amber in color but the heat is great. As one other review stated, you should not pay over $500.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with my purchase. The unit is sturdy, functional, and beautiful. Takes a little while to put together but worth it. Produces plenty of heat and has a nice look.
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and relaxing
customer_reviews.text: Love it, just the right amount of light and options.
customer_reviews.author: dwilt

customer_reviews.title: unable to assemble, returned for a refund
customer_reviews.text: We were really excited to get this, however when putting it together, the drilled holes did not line up properly to assemble the unit. The holes were a good inch off, we would have had to alter the product in order to assemble it. Plus, some of the screws are so short, they didn't stay in the wood. We returned it for a full refund and will purchase something of better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Nice & Warm
customer_reviews.text: Even though the original heater made funny noises, when I called to report it they sent a new one within a week and picked up the defective one. Now it works well and looks great in our living room.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Magalit

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my living room!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great!! Very attractive and no too bad to assemble. I'm happy with it. Adds a good feeling to the room. I like that you can use it even when the heater is not on.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Fireplace
customer_reviews.text: This product was very easy to assemble and it fit perfectly into the place we were wanting it. The color is good & it works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: kb

customer_reviews.title: will recommend
customer_reviews.text: This fit my needs so well. It took some time to put it together but worth it..it made my house look good. Great piece I have recommended it to many people.. thank you
customer_reviews.author: debra mayhill

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great warmth, a little difficult to put together but is great end result
customer_reviews.author: Cheri Sceckler

customer_reviews.title: What a nice addition to our home theater
customer_reviews.text: What a nice addition to our home theater. We were wanting a Dimplex but we couldn't be more satisfied. The adjustment options are amazing: up/down temp, fire light and coals intensity, lighted firebox. I tell you this baby has it all. One picky item: the instructions (particularly the illustrations) could be better. Hey, but so what...the labor was worth it. I saw the same unit listed at KOHL'S for more than $750!
customer_reviews.author: Deacon

customer_reviews.title: A great console
customer_reviews.text: There is some indicible joy with turning on a fireplace with a remote control. The console is strong and well-built, exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: chick

customer_reviews.title: SEI Narita Espresso Media Console with fireplace
customer_reviews.text: I really love my new media console! It looks great and can really heat up the room. I am using this in the back room which is on a concrete slab so it gets a little cold. The heater really helps take the chill out of the room. My cousin put it together for me and did a great job. She would suggest you have an electric screwdriver as there are many screws used to put it together. It shipped quick and the company backs its product. I had to reorder the sides for minor problems we saw before putting it together and the shipped them out without question.
customer_reviews.author: M. S. Fenner

customer_reviews.title: Great entertainment Center
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of parts but once you get it put together it looks great and works great to warm up a room. My daughter & I put it together in about two hours.
customer_reviews.author: Carol L. Linot

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: This console was everything I wanted and assembly was well documented. Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Adele Jones

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: I would suggest this to friends. Was super easy to put together. Very well made. Instructions are clear and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ohio buyer
customer_reviews.text: i love it the fire and the logs look good the fire looks real and it heats really good in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: AMOS

customer_reviews.title: nice.......
customer_reviews.text: Looks good...good price....works well and was easy to put together!!! Hubby didn't even cuss once. (he likes it too). :)
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Mooney

customer_reviews.title: Electric Fireplace with media console space
customer_reviews.text: My family love our new fireplace. It is beautiful and very sturdy. The unit was easy and quick to assembly.
customer_reviews.author: kathy gordon

customer_reviews.title: Quick warmth
customer_reviews.text: My parents needed something for there room without breaking the bank. Once it was delivered and assembled, it worked like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Keystone Colorado Mother

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Furniture Addition
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for and it was very easy for me to assemble. I thank you very much!
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Holland

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking fireplace. Love the color and it works Great! Would recommend it to anyone. I have it on right now!
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover 2

customer_reviews.title: MADE OUT OF SAWDUST AND GLUE
customer_reviews.text: This is a cheap piece of crap that is made out of sawdust and glue! i sent it back and got my money back,because it would not last very long before it starts crumbling.(cuz it is made out of sawdust and glue,not REAL wood!) it wasnt worth the trouble of unpacking it/packing it back in the box!
customer_reviews.author: targeted demographic

customer_reviews.title: very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: The shipping was soo fast! Very pleased with the amount of heat it puts out. Was nervous about the way the fire was going to look after reading some other reviews and my husband and I LOVE the way it looks! Couldn't be happier. Easy to put together and very sturdy. My husband had the entire thing put together on his own in less than an hour. Couldn't be happier with the product and the price is unbeatable!
customer_reviews.author: dance4kix316

customer_reviews.title: never knew
customer_reviews.text: I am totally enjoying the media console with the electric fireplace. The fireplace could look a bit more real, but all in all worth it.
customer_reviews.author: dmnitgumby

customer_reviews.title: Nightmare
customer_reviews.text: Nightmare, Very cheap looking, horrible directions, shipped only half the item. Send it back to China! Do not wate your time and money.
customer_reviews.author: dan baker

customer_reviews.title: False Advertisement
customer_reviews.text: This was total false advertisement. It says "with" electric fireplace. It did not. So when i called and asked where the fireplace insert was I had to order it form another company and had to pay more for it. At first I was told I would get the second box separate. But it never came. I had already put together the entertainment center and they wanted me to disassemble it and send it back after I spent 2 hours putting the thing together. After a week of arguing about it I then had to pay more and order it from the distributer.
customer_reviews.author: lesley

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: If you have seen fireboxes in stores and thought they looked good, dont buy this one. The firebox is no where near what you will see in stores. This is not a good Dimplex type firebox that you might get otherwise. It looks terrible. The logs look bad, doesnt resemble a fire much at all, you dont see flames, just weird glowing light. The dimplex insert is soo much nicer and this is not that. The furniture part is nice, but the firebox is horrible. Also the motor in the firebox makes a loud annoying sound and causes vibrations in the unit. Not Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

product_meta.title: SEI Furniture Narita Media Electric Fireplace 48" - Remote Control Radiant Heater - Glazed Pine Wood Finish
product_meta.description: contemporary styling, modern conveniences, and the relaxing glow of fire are all combined into this luxurious piece. Finished with a rich espresso stain, the firebox itself is framed on each side by lattice style cabinets with adjustable shelves. Features 2 media shelves, 2 cabinets, and 2 adjustable shelves total. Above is an open shelf, divided in two by the center support structure. The open shelf includes two cord management openings, making it ideal for all of your media equipment or game consoles. The firebox has realistic, multicolor flickering flames and glowing embers with an interior brick design for a more lifelike look. This transitional fireplace is great for the living room and bedroom, and even adds a warm touch to the dining room or home office. This electric fireplace features energy efficient LED and requires no professional installation, making it a cost effective way to upgrade your living or media room. LED lights also offer optional down light illumination. Easy to use remote control offers 4-way adjustability to warm the room conveniently. Remote control adjusts thermostat, timer, logs, and flames separately. Safety features include automatic shutoff and glass that remains cool to the touch (safe, self-regulating heater turns off when desired temperature is met). Once powered off, logs and flames slowly turn down. Turn off the heat to enjoy the fireplace ambience year round! This wonderful piece offers supplemental heat for up to 400 square feet. Accommodates a flat panel TV up to 46" W overall and conveniently plugs into a standard wall outlet a with 6' cord. Specifications: Temperature ratings: 62-82 degrees at 4 degree intervals; Heating/power: 120V/60Hz, 1500W, 12.5 Amps; Batteries: 1 CR2025, included. Dimensions include: verall: 48" W x 16.25" D x 32.5" H; Firebox front: 23" W x 20" H; Media shelves: 22.75" W x 15.25" D x 5.5" H; Cabinets: 9.25" W x 14.25" D x 21" H; Cabinet shelves: 9" W x 14.25" D x 10.25" H (adjust 2" up/down). This one-of-a-kind item approximately weighs 130.5 pounds and can support up to 85 pounds (mantel), 15 pounds (per shelf). Only quality materials and manufacturing will do. Product materials include: red oak, MDF, particle board, ash veneer, 4mm tempered glass, metal, resin, glass. Assembly: Required. Made in China.
